topics.body:
You know what would be a good game/movie or such?

I would like a game where you have to choose between the good and bad side and the good side is good and the bad side is bad, but the gimmick is that the bad side is bad because the good side is grossly incompetent to the utter extremes.

Just coming off with something off the top of my head but for example the good side wants to feed everyone, give them homes to the homeless and such but they're such utter garbage at it that they take in all the homeless people in the entire world and as a result the good side is so grossly overpopulated that by the time the ration train comes by again people are barely getting enough food let alone medical treatment or even toilets.  The bad side wants to use forced labor to increase food production and while they want to use forced labor they don't plan on having them in camps that way the player is forced to choose between either the populace having food or against forced labor.
